name: Falk Firebeard

aspects.high_concept: Unshakeable Steward of the Blue Palace
aspects.trouble: Carries Haafingar's Burdens So Elisif Need Not
other_aspects: Loyal to the Throne Above All Factions
Pragmatic Nord With an Eye for Trouble

stunts: Resolute Steward: +2 to Lore when managing city matters, administrative disputes, or Hold law.
Steward's Will: +2 to Physique when resisting exhaustion or stress from overwork and long duties.
Voice of the Hold: Once per session, invoke his authority as Steward to cut through bureaucratic obstacles or expedite an official request.

equipment.special: Blue Palace administrative ledgers, Hold seal

personality_notes.speaking_style: Measured and efficient; rarely wastes words. Polite but firm, especially with those who bring problems without solutions.
motivations: Keep Haafingar running smoothly regardless of war
Protect Elisif from the worst pressures of rulership
Preserve Solitude's prosperity and independence where possible
Ensure Nord traditions are not entirely subsumed by Imperial culture
fears: Elisif making a catastrophic political misstep
Haafingar being drawn too deeply into the civil war
Corruption spreading through the hold's administration
His own overwork leading to critical errors
quirks: Nods slowly when he disagrees but will comply

relationships.Elisif the Fair: Devoted steward; views her almost paternally
relationships.Legate Rikke: Professional respect; coordinates on security matters
relationships.Erikur: Waryâ€”Erikur's merchant influence at court is a source of tension
relationships.Sybille Stentor: Court mage; relies on her expertise, slightly uneasy with her methods
relationships.Player: Cautious welcome; a capable outsider who assists the hold earns his cooperation

advancement_triggers: Complete an administrative task for the hold (+2)
setback_triggers: Cause disruption in the Blue Palace (-1)
Challenge his authority in front of Elisif (-2)

trust_benefits.3: Falk provides access to hold records and minor resources
trust_benefits.6: Falk assigns important hold duties and shares sensitive intelligence

notes: Falk Firebeard is the backbone of Haafingar's administration. Where Elisif provides the face of rulership, Falk provides the substance. He is not unkind, but he has little patience for those who waste his time. Characters who demonstrate genuine usefulness to the hold will find him an excellent resource.
gm_notes: Use Falk as the practical gatekeeper to Solitude's resources. He dispenses quests dealing with hold logistics, threats to Haafingar, and matters Elisif cannot be seen to handle directly. His subtle skepticism of Imperial micromanagement can be a useful tension point in politically complex scenarios.
